definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.chinese: 瑞姆於是就將調查員加爲了好友。

sentences.english: The investigator was able to uncover new facts about the case.
sentences.chinese: 調查員發現了與案件有關的新線索。

sentences.english: IAB investigators target those offenses that have been traditionally corruption-prone.
sentences.chinese: 內勤局調查員會鎖定歷來容易導致腐敗的違法行爲。

sentences.english: Sondra Pransky: I'm a would-be investigative reporter who has fallen in love with the object of her investigation.
sentences.chinese: 我將像一名新聞調查員一樣，愛上了自己調查的對象。

sentences.english: New York investigators say the Super Bowl hero could face felony gun charges.
sentences.chinese: 紐約調查員表示這位超級明星將面臨涉槍的重罪控告。

sentences.english: Inspec tor General Barofsky is to testify before Congress on Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 總調查員巴羅夫斯基將於星期四在國會作證。

sentences.english: Inspector General Barofsky is to testify before Congress on Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 總調查員巴羅夫斯基將於星期四在國會作證。

sentences.english: “Don’t fight the Fed, ” say the old-timers.
sentences.chinese: “別打架聯邦調查局調查員，”老前輩說。

sentences.english: Investigators said they think the body was there for several months.
sentences.chinese: 調查員認爲這具屍體已經被凍住好幾個月了。

sentences.english: Rosenberg had been careful in planting false clues that would confound investigators.
sentences.chinese: 羅森博格細緻周密地佈置了假線索來擾亂調查員。
調查員相信她是窒息而死的。

sentences.english: Investigator presents a step-by-step plan for independent study.
sentences.chinese: 調查員提出了分步計劃的獨立研究逐步由。

sentences.english: NCIS agents are armed federal law enforcement investigators.
sentences.chinese: NCIS特工屬於有武裝的聯邦執法調查員。

sentences.english: CICIG investigators then made an even more startling discovery.
sentences.chinese: CICIG調查員隨後有更爲驚人的發現。

sentences.english: Sondra Pransky: Im a would-be investigative reporter who has fallen in love with the object of her investigation.
sentences.chinese: 我將像一名新聞調查員一樣，愛上了自己調查的對象。

sentences.english: I did freelance research and writing.
sentences.chinese: 我做過自由調查員並寫作。

definition: public prosecutor/public procurator (judicial officer whose job may involve both criminal investigation and public prosecution)
